message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.HC, cs.RO 

The paper discusses techniques for obtaining motion capture data from video recordings, which is a common problem in computer vision and graphics. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses strategies for maximizing accuracy and efficiency, which suggests a focus on human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and robotics (cs.RO). Additionally, the paper applies reconstruction techniques to derive 3D structure, which falls under the sub-categories of computer graphics (cs.GR) and multimedia (cs.MM).
